text: Flask Glacier, is a glacier long. The lower part of this glacier were surveyed and photographed by the Falkland Islands Dependencies (FIDS) from 1947-1957, with the whole glacier being photographed during 1955-56, and fully mapped in 1957. == Tributary glaciers == * Ambergris Glacier * Belogradchik Glacier == Related pages == * List of glaciers in the Antarctic * List of Antarctic ice streams * Glaciology == Further reading == * T.
